extension.name: MiwoEvents - Locations
extension.author: Miwisoft LLC
extension.description: This module is used to show the list of locations or events based on location.

field.name: number_locations
field.label: Number of Locations
field.description: Number of locations to be shown.

field.name: show_number_events
field.label: Show number of events
field.description: If set to Yes, it will show the number of events next to the location.

field.name: link_type
field.label: Link target
field.description: Select whether the link will show the location details or events based on location.
